sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Post() { const [result1,setresult1] = useState([]) const [likeCount,setlikeCount]=useState(0) let history=useHistory(); let fs=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('filterData')) useEffect(() => { if(!localStorage.getItem('Token')) { history.push('./login') } if(!localStorage.getItem('filterData')) { getData() } else{ setresult1(fs) } }, [fs,likeCount]) const getData=()=>axios({method: 'post',url:'http://localhost:5000/getPost'}).then(result=>{ setresult1(result.data); }); /// code for likes const handle=()=>{ setlikeCount(likeCount++) } return ( <> { (result1.length!==0)?result1.map(val=>
{val.title}
{val.category}
{ val.userId }
{val.date} {val.time}
  • Share
  • Flag
  • 4 Comments
  • handle}> Likes
    • {likeCount}
  • Unlike
    • 4
) :'' } ) } export default Post
